Text:
Around the 21th minute there's a little glitch in the transmission. It was in both first two morning transmissions, but was corrected in the afternoon transmission. For the sake of completeness and without having to encode and upload this episode in its entirety or part of it I just quote the missing sentence here:

"I do want to demilitarize virtue, I plead guilty to that. What I wanna do is to to... I want us to get over the habit."
